name: DYNAMITE (itch)
description:
This is a fanmade My hero academia game having Bakugo as the main character its an fps style game. The story takes place where the heroes are beaten up and Izuku is at the brink of death these bones are shattered so he is in a container that heals his body and keeps him alive you Bakugo have to defend it from the mindless Nomus. You(Bakugo) your own legs are broken all you can do is glide around using one blaster and the other blaster to shoot the Nomus.

 This is just a prototype I will be improving and adding more characters and attacks and enemies Please do try this and give me your views on it your support will be really appreciated. Thank you for playing it.
